LanguageData.JRWAllosaurusReconstruct.label: Allosaurus
LanguageData.JRWAllosaurusReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #08822-1877 [ALLOSAURUS FRAGILIS] CODENAME: NEMEAN >27
A large, blood red theropod with a distinctly curved neck. They are known to sport a very foul temper once provoked.
